title: Episode 13: How Unrealistic Relationship Expectations Hurt Your Relationship(s)
description:
If you’ve ever felt resentment, frustration, or disappointment in your relationships, this episode is for you. We talk about why our beliefs about what relationships “should be” get in the way of us having the relationship we want. You’ll learn why society sets us up to believe another person completes us (they don’t!), why conflict isn’t always s bad, and how we can all create healthy relationships.
